rlTimeSynchronization.name: rlTimeSynchronization
rlTimeSynchronization.description: The MIB module describes the private MIB for SNTP & TIME definitions.

NTPTimeStamp.name: NTPTimeStamp
NTPTimeStamp.description: NTP timestamps are represented as a 64-bit unsigned fixed-point number, in seconds relative to 00:00 on 1 January 1900. The integer part is in the first 32 bits and the fraction part is in the last 32 bits.
NTPTimeStamp.reference: D.L. Mills, 'Network Time Protocol (Version 3)', RFC-1305, March 1992, Section 3.1

NTPSignedTimeValue.name: NTPSignedTimeValue
NTPSignedTimeValue.description: The time in seconds that could represent signed quantities like time delay with respect to some source. This textual-convention is specific to RADLAN implementation of NTP where 32-bit integers are used for such quantities. The signed integer part is in the first 16 bits and the fraction part is in the last 16 bits.

NTPStratum.name: NTPStratum
NTPStratum.description: Indicates the stratum of the clock. The stratum defines the accuracy of a time server. Higher the stratum, lower the accuracy. 0, unspecified 1, primary reference (e.g., calibrated atomic clock, radio clock) 2-255, secondary reference (via NTP)
NTPStratum.reference: D.L. Mills, 'Network Time Protocol (Version 3)', RFC-1305, March 1992, Section 2.2

rndTimeSyncManagedTime.name: rndTimeSyncManagedTime
rndTimeSyncManagedTime.description: The time will be sent in the format hhmmss

rndTimeSyncManagedDate.name: rndTimeSyncManagedDate
rndTimeSyncManagedDate.description: The date will be sent in the format ddmmyy

rndTimeSyncManagedDateTime.name: rndTimeSyncManagedDateTime
rndTimeSyncManagedDateTime.description: The date and time will be sent in the format ddmmyyhhmmss

rlTimeSyncMethod.name: rlTimeSyncMethod
rlTimeSyncMethod.description: Method to be used for time synchronization in the device.

rlDaylightSavingTimeStart.name: rlDaylightSavingTimeStart
rlDaylightSavingTimeStart.description: Daylight Saving Time start date. In recurring mode: week wday month hh:mm In date mode: month day year hh:mm week: 0-6 (0=First, 6=Last) wday: 1-7 (Sunday-Saturday) month: 1-12 (January-December) day: 1-31 year: 0-99 (2000-2099) hh: 0-23 (hours) mm: 0-59 (minutes)

rlDaylightSavingTimeEnd.name: rlDaylightSavingTimeEnd
rlDaylightSavingTimeEnd.description: Daylight Saving Time end date. In recurring mode: week wday month hh:mm In date mode: month day year hh:mm week: 0-6 (0=First, 6=Last) wday: 1-7 (Sunday-Saturday) month: 1-12 (January-December) day: 1-31 year: 0-99 (2000-2099) hh: 0-23 (hours) mm: 0-59 (minutes)

rlDaylightSavingTimeOffset.name: rlDaylightSavingTimeOffset
rlDaylightSavingTimeOffset.description: Daylight Saving Time - The number of minutes to add to the clock during summer time.

rlDaylightSavingTimeCode.name: rlDaylightSavingTimeCode
rlDaylightSavingTimeCode.description: Code definition for current Daylight Saving Time.

rlTZDSTOffset.name: rlTZDSTOffset
rlTZDSTOffset.description: Local Time Zone and Daylight Saving Time offset in seconds.

rlSntpNtpConfigMode.name: rlSntpNtpConfigMode
rlSntpNtpConfigMode.description: Current configuration operational mode of SNTP/NTP client.

rlSntpNtpConfigSysStratum.name: rlSntpNtpConfigSysStratum
rlSntpNtpConfigSysStratum.description: The stratum of the local clock. If the value is set to 1, i.e., this is a primary reference, then the Primary-Clock procedure described in Section 3.4.6, in RFC-1305 is invoked.

rlSntpNtpConfigPollInterval.name: rlSntpNtpConfigPollInterval
rlSntpNtpConfigPollInterval.description: Period of time (in seconds) between succesive attempts to perform an update via SNTP.

rlSntpNtpConfigPrimaryPollSrvAddr.name: rlSntpNtpConfigPrimaryPollSrvAddr
rlSntpNtpConfigPrimaryPollSrvAddr.description: Ip Address of a trusted SNTP server for polling.

rlSntpNtpConfigPrimaryPollSrvMrid.name: rlSntpNtpConfigPrimaryPollSrvMrid
rlSntpNtpConfigPrimaryPollSrvMrid.description: The mrid of the primary server.

rlSntpNtpConfigPrimaryPollSrvIfIndex.name: rlSntpNtpConfigPrimaryPollSrvIfIndex
rlSntpNtpConfigPrimaryPollSrvIfIndex.description: The interface addressed of the primary server.

rlSntpNtpConfigPrimaryPollSrvStratum.name: rlSntpNtpConfigPrimaryPollSrvStratum
rlSntpNtpConfigPrimaryPollSrvStratum.description: The stratum of the primary polling server.

rlSntpNtpConfigSyncSrvAddr.name: rlSntpNtpConfigSyncSrvAddr
rlSntpNtpConfigSyncSrvAddr.description: Ip Address of the synced server.

rlSntpNtpConfigSyncSrvMrid.name: rlSntpNtpConfigSyncSrvMrid
rlSntpNtpConfigSyncSrvMrid.description: The mrid of the synced server.

rlSntpNtpConfigSyncSrvIfIndex.name: rlSntpNtpConfigSyncSrvIfIndex
rlSntpNtpConfigSyncSrvIfIndex.description: The interface addressed of the synced server.

rlSntpNtpConfigSyncSrvStratum.name: rlSntpNtpConfigSyncSrvStratum
rlSntpNtpConfigSyncSrvStratum.description: The stratum of the synced server.

rlSntpClientMode.name: rlSntpClientMode
rlSntpClientMode.description: Current operational mode of SNTP client.

rlSntpUnicastAdminState.name: rlSntpUnicastAdminState
rlSntpUnicastAdminState.description: SNTP Unicast Administrative state - Enable/Disable SNTP. In case of reinitializing polling or time synchronization this MIB is modified. The MIB can be enabled even thought it is already enabled.

rlSntpBroadcastAdminState.name: rlSntpBroadcastAdminState
rlSntpBroadcastAdminState.description: SNTP Broadcast Administrative state - Enable/Disable SNTP. In case of reinitializing polling or time synchronization this MIB is modified. The MIB can be enabled even thought it is already enabled.

rlSntpAnycastAdminState.name: rlSntpAnycastAdminState
rlSntpAnycastAdminState.description: SNTP Anycast Administrative state - Enable/Disable SNTP. In case of reinitializing polling or time synchronization this MIB is modified. The MIB can be enabled even thought it is already enabled.

rlSntpUnicastPollState.name: rlSntpUnicastPollState
rlSntpUnicastPollState.description: SNTP Unicast poll state - TRUE for polled.

rlSntpBroadcastPollState.name: rlSntpBroadcastPollState
rlSntpBroadcastPollState.description: SNTP Broadcast poll state - TRUE for polled.

rlSntpAnycastPollState.name: rlSntpAnycastPollState
rlSntpAnycastPollState.description: SNTP Anycast poll state - TRUE for polled.

rlSntpConfigBroadcastTable.name: rlSntpConfigBroadcastTable
rlSntpConfigBroadcastTable.description: A table containing broadcast mode information per interface.

rlSntpBroadcastEntry.name: rlSntpBroadcastEntry
rlSntpBroadcastEntry.description: Private paramters for interface: sntp status, broadcast mode.

rlSntpBroadcastIfIndex.name: rlSntpBroadcastIfIndex
rlSntpBroadcastIfIndex.description: The interface addressed by this entry.

rlSntpBroadcastIfAdminState.name: rlSntpBroadcastIfAdminState
rlSntpBroadcastIfAdminState.description: SNTP interface Adminstrative state- Enable/Disable SNTP. In case of reinitializing polling or time synchronization this MIB is modified. The MIB can be enabled even thought it is already enabled.

rlSntpBroadcastMode.name: rlSntpBroadcastMode
rlSntpBroadcastMode.description: SNTP/NTP Broadcast Mode. none - no broadcast SNTP packets are received or sent. Receive - host only receive SNTP packets that were sent to broadcast address (were not directed to the host). This is multicast mode in the RFC. Send - host only send SNTP packets and wait for replies directed to the host. This is anycast mode in the RFC. ReceiveSend - host receive broadcast messages (destination is broadcast address in the received messages) and send SNTP packets to wait for replies directed to the host (destination address of the reply is the host address). This mode combines anycast and multicast modes in the RFC.

rlSntpBroadcastPolled.name: rlSntpBroadcastPolled
rlSntpBroadcastPolled.description: TRUE if participating in polling cycle, else FALSE.

rlSntpBroadcastAddress.name: rlSntpBroadcastAddress
rlSntpBroadcastAddress.description: Ip Address of a trusted SNTP server.

rlSntpBroadcastStatus.name: rlSntpBroadcastStatus
rlSntpBroadcastStatus.description: The Operational State of the remote IP Address of the SNTP Broadcast. unknown - requests were not sent yet. inProcess - replies were not received yet. up - server sent SNTP packets. down - server stopped sending SNTP packets.

rlSntpBroadcastOffset.name: rlSntpBroadcastOffset
rlSntpBroadcastOffset.description: The estimated offset of the server's clock relative to the local clock, in seconds. The host determines the value of this object using the algorithm described in RFC 2030.

rlSntpBroadcastDelay.name: rlSntpBroadcastDelay
rlSntpBroadcastDelay.description: The estimated round-trip delay of the server's clock relative to the local clock over the network path between them, in seconds. The host determines the value of this object using the algorithm described in RFC 2030.

rlSntpBroadcastRowStatus.name: rlSntpBroadcastRowStatus
rlSntpBroadcastRowStatus.description: The Status of this SNTP broadcast interface information.

rlSntpConfigAnycastTable.name: rlSntpConfigAnycastTable
rlSntpConfigAnycastTable.description: A table containing anycast information per interface.

rlSntpAnycastEntry.name: rlSntpAnycastEntry
rlSntpAnycastEntry.description: Private paramters for interface: server info.

rlSntpAnycastIfIndex.name: rlSntpAnycastIfIndex
rlSntpAnycastIfIndex.description: The interface addressed by this entry.

rlSntpAnycastAddress.name: rlSntpAnycastAddress
rlSntpAnycastAddress.description: Ip Address of a trusted SNTP server.

rlSntpAnycastStatus.name: rlSntpAnycastStatus
rlSntpAnycastStatus.description: The Operational State of the remote IP Address of the SNTP Anycast. unknown - requests were not sent yet. inProcess - replies were not received yet. up - server sent SNTP packets. down - server stopped sending SNTP packets.

rlSntpAnycastOffset.name: rlSntpAnycastOffset
rlSntpAnycastOffset.description: The estimated offset of the server's clock relative to the local clock, in seconds. The host determines the value of this object using the algorithm described in RFC 2030.

rlSntpAnycastDelay.name: rlSntpAnycastDelay
rlSntpAnycastDelay.description: The estimated round-trip delay of the server's clock relative to the local clock over the network path between them, in seconds. The host determines the value of this object using the algorithm described in RFC 2030.

rlSntpAnycastRowStatus.name: rlSntpAnycastRowStatus
rlSntpAnycastRowStatus.description: The Status of this SNTP anycast interface information.

rlSntpConfigServerTable.name: rlSntpConfigServerTable
rlSntpConfigServerTable.description: A table containing trusted SNTP servers to be queried in unicast or broadcast mode.

rlSntpServerAddress.name: rlSntpServerAddress
rlSntpServerAddress.description: Ip Address of a trusted SNTP server.

rlSntpServerPolled.name: rlSntpServerPolled
rlSntpServerPolled.description: TRUE if participating in polling cycle, else FALSE.

rlSntpServerStatus.name: rlSntpServerStatus
rlSntpServerStatus.description: The Operational State of the remote IP Address of the SNTP Server. unknown - requests were not sent yet. inProcess - replies were not received yet. up - server sent SNTP packets. down - server stopped sending SNTP packets.

rlSntpServersOffset.name: rlSntpServersOffset
rlSntpServersOffset.description: The estimated offset of the server's clock relative to the local clock, in seconds. The host determines the value of this object using the algorithm described in RFC 2030.

rlSntpServersDelay.name: rlSntpServersDelay
rlSntpServersDelay.description: The estimated round-trip delay of the server's clock relative to the local clock over the network path between them, in seconds. The host determines the value of this object using the algorithm described in RFC 2030.

rlSntpServersKeyIdentifier.name: rlSntpServersKeyIdentifier
rlSntpServersKeyIdentifier.description: Authentication key identifier. The valid range is 1-4294967295. Value zero, means no authentication is being done.

rlSntpServerRowStatus.name: rlSntpServerRowStatus
rlSntpServerRowStatus.description: The Status of this SNTP server information.

rlSntpAuthenticationEntry.name: rlSntpAuthenticationEntry
rlSntpAuthenticationEntry.description: Keys information for authenticationof NTP packets.

rlSntpAuthenticationKeyID.name: rlSntpAuthenticationKeyID
rlSntpAuthenticationKeyID.description: The key identifier. Valid rabge for key identifier is 1-4294967295.

rlSntpAuthenticationRowStatus.name: rlSntpAuthenticationRowStatus
rlSntpAuthenticationRowStatus.description: The Status of this Authentication key information.
